message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm willing to sell it for $20,000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. However, my budget allows me to spend up to $10,000 on this item. Would it be possible for you to adjust your offer to meet my budget?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below the value of this product. I'm willing to negotiate, so how about we meet in the middle at $17,000?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand that you value the product highly, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $17,000 price point. Would it be possible for us to discuss a price closer to my budget, perhaps around $13,000?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need to be closer to $15,000 to make this worthwhile.  Would you consider $14,500?

Alice, thank you for your flexibility. Considering my budget and the value I place on this product, I believe we can reach an agreement closer to my limit. How about we aim for $13,500? This price aligns better with my financial situation while still reflecting the value I see in the product.
